entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -27.3°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times early in the evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
